sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_E WHERE PRT_CD =S.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND ASSETS_CD=S.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND ASSETS_SCD=S.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) GIS_STAT,
S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_FCLTY, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NM, G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GAM_GETLOCCDNAME(G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD GIS_ASSETS_CD_FCLTY, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD_FCLTY, G.LAND_PRT_AT_CODE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.LAND_ASSETS_CD GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.LAND_ASSETS_SUB_CD GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_NM, G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM, G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, G.GIS_ASSETS_AR, G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI,
'' GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, '전체' GIS_PRT_FCLTY_NM,
F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD,
GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM066', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) GIS_PRT_FCLTY_NM,
GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM067', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) GIS_PRT_FCLTY_NM,
GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM068', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) GIS_PRT_FCLTY_NM,
GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM069', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) GIS_PRT_FCLTY_NM,
GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM070', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) GIS_PRT_FCLTY_NM,
F.PRT_FCLTY_SE, F.FCLTY_CNT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_V G, ( SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, PRT_FCLTY_SE, GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, COUNT(*) FCLTY_CNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE 1=1
PRT_FCLTY_SE=#fcltySe#
GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#fcltyCd#
GROUP BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, PRT_FCLTY_SE, GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ) F where G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #gisAssetsLnm#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #gisAssetsLnmSub#
) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC WHERE 1 = 1 AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = 'L'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #sPrprtySeCd#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #sGisAssetsLnm#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #sGisAssetsLnmSub#

SELECT COUNT(*) SUM_CNT , SUM(NVL(F.FCLTY_CNT, 0)) SUM_FCLTY_CNT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_V G, ( SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, PRT_FCLTY_SE, GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, COUNT(*) FCLTY_CNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE 1=1
PRT_FCLTY_SE=#fcltySe#
GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#fcltyCd#
GROUP BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, PRT_FCLTY_SE, GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ) F where G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #gisAssetsLnm#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #gisAssetsLnmSub#

SELECT GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_CD# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#ASSETS_CD# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#ASSETS_SCD#

SELECT GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, CASE WHEN PRT_FCLTY_SE='A' THEN NVL(GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM066', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD),'전체') WHEN PRT_FCLTY_SE='M' THEN NVL(GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM067', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD),'전체') WHEN PRT_FCLTY_SE='E' THEN NVL(GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM068', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD),'전체') WHEN PRT_FCLTY_SE='I' THEN NVL(GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM069', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD),'전체') ELSE NVL(GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM070', GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD),'전체') END GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_NM, COUNT(GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_CD# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD =#ASSETS_CD# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD =#ASSETS_SCD# GROUP BY GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, PRT_FCLTY_SE
